intension: Create a series of posters for a fictional Ancient Greek Olympics, with each poster highlighting a different sport like chariot racing or discus throw, styled in traditional Greek pottery art.
globalcaption: The image features a man and a woman, both wearing armor, standing next to each other. They appear to be participating in a sports event, possibly a competition. The woman is holding a spear, while the man is holding a shield. \n\nIn the background, there is a chariot, which suggests that the event might be related to chariot racing. The scene is set in a stadium, with a clock visible in the background, indicating the time of the event. The overall atmosphere of the image is energetic and exciting, as the participants are engaged in the competition.
keywords: olympic, sport, game, competition, ancient, greek, olympics, illustration, championship, stadium, tournament, marathon, race, art, chariot, discus, man, woman, poster, instagram, post, insta, ig

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a woman standing on a chariot, holding a spear. She appears to be a warrior or a princess, as she is wearing a helmet and a suit of armor. The chariot is positioned in the center of the image, with the woman standing on it.\n\nIn the background, there is a clock visible, possibly indicating the time or serving as a decorative element. The scene is set against a blue sky, which adds a sense of depth and contrast to the image
